SELECT i.*, u.userName FROM institution i LEFT JOIN user u ON i.creatorId = u.userId
AND i.institutionId = #{institutionId}

SELECT ap.*, a.archiveName, a.archiveId, u.userName AS creatorName FROM institution ap LEFT JOIN archive a ON ap.institutionId = a.institutionId LEFT JOIN user u ON ap.creatorId = u.userId
AND ap.institutionId = #{institutionId}
